author: mark_antonacci
post: Dan, the petition has always described the testing as minimally invasive (except for a one day typo). Other statements such as press releases may use similar, but not always identical language such as minimally invasive or non invasive. The only changes made to the petition were a) to identify the pope by name after a successor to Pope Benedict XVI was named, and b) to ask Pope Francis to include the tests and experiments that I have described extensively on the web site and elsewhere in any future testing. Mark Antonacci P.S. Colinsberry, thanks for the “compliment.” (I’ll be looking for a check soon.) Thanks also for an initial look at the scientific merits behind the testing..
title: Some Questions About Mark Antonacci’s Petition
